alert.note: Alert for Bond; Macoupin; Madison (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:46PM CDT until May 19 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bond County in south central Illinois... Madison County in southwestern Illinois... Southern Macoupin County in southwestern Illinois... East central St. Charles County in east central Missouri... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 545 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Alton to near Highland, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... St. Jacob and Marine around 550 PM CDT. Highland around 555 PM CDT. Pocahontas, Dorsey and Prairietown around 605 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Bunker Hill, Shipman and Staunton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 21 and 36. Interstate 55 in Illinois between exits 23 and 37. This also includes Confluence State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Illinois...and east central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Illinois...and east central Missouri.
